title: I do not get style & wallpaper option in my display settings on my pixel 4a. What to do?
content:
1. trying to set wallpaper by selecting the photo but get message "cannot load image".
2. When tapped on home screen and clicked wallpaper, says "app not installed"
3. in settings menu - display, there is no menu called "styles & wallpapers"
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
